item.description:
We may have an opportunity to have a table at the Wake Up the Earth festival at Southwest Corridor Park, across
from the Stony Brook T stop on the orange line, this Saturday. I'll post details here soon, when I know more.

The festival is 10am-5pm, but practically, people tend to be there between noon and 5pm. If you're free during part of the day between 12-5 and can be at the table, please RSVP here.
item.name: Gather signatures at Wake Up the Earth
